nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine 17
Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine 17 is the seventeenth issue of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine. It was released on April 2, 2013.

Just when you thought things couldn't get any worse for our heroes in the Clone Wars, the villains have taken over the latest issue of the magazine! Even Anakin is suffering from their influence, as he turns against his Master in the first of two awesome comic strips! Plus, don't miss our look at the greatest space battles from the series, your spectacular reader art and more puzzles than you can shake a lightsaber at!
